author: adiasg
content: How do VCs get the `signing_root` for an attestation? The computation requires state access (https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/v1.0.0/specs/phase0/validator.md#aggregate-signature), and the BN's attestation production endpoint doesn't return `signing_root` (https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/#/ValidatorRequiredApi/produceAttestationData)

author: jgm
content: You don't need much state, just the epoch and the for schedule.  You can fetch them from other bits of the API.
